body: If you have constructs as a favored enemy, you can use your favored enemy bonus toward constructs in place of the bonus granted by this feat if it's larger. These bonuses do not stack with those granted by other abilities that allow you to add your favored enemy bonus to AC or on saving throws.
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Feats/Robots Bane/Special
name: Special
